data.name: FileBased_Info
data.value: El otorgamiento de licencias se realiza con un archivo en el sistema de archivos, las plantillas se recuperan desde el sistema de archivos donde se guardan y los registros se almacenan en el sistema de archivos.
data.comment: Text explaining when licensing and voice templates are done on the device.

data.name: ServerBased
data.comment: Application screen label

data.name: ServerBased_Info
data.value: El otorgamiento de licencias se realiza con un archivo en el sistema de archivos, las plantillas se recuperan desde el servidor de plantillas donde se guardan y los registros se almacenan en el sistema de archivos.
data.comment: Application screen label, explaining licensing.

data.name: VoiceConsoleBased
data.comment: Text in a listing

data.name: VoiceConsoleBased_Info
data.value: El otorgamiento de licencias se realiza mediante VoiceConsole, las plantillas se recuperan desde VoiceConsole donde se guardan y los registros se almacenan en el sistema de archivos, al igual que se envían a VoiceConsole cuando la creación de registros está habilitada.
data.comment: Message in the Application Settings menu.

data.name: MicroserviceBased
data.comment: Text in a listing

data.name: MicroserviceBased_Info
data.value: El otorgamiento de licencias se realiza mediante los microservicios, las plantillas se recuperan y guardan mediante los microservicios y los registros se almacenan en el sistema de archivos.
data.comment: Text explaining microservices.

data.name: NoLicenseBased
data.comment: Text in a listing

data.name: NoLicenseBased_Info
data.value: Se usa Sin licencia, es posible que algunas de las funciones avanzadas no estén disponibles. Las plantillas se recuperan del servidor al que se está conectando
data.comment: Text explaining no licensing.

data.name: Abortable_AbortHeaderMsg
data.comment: Header text displayed when a user aborts the blocking operation.

data.name: Abortable_CompletedHeaderMsg
data.comment: Header text displayed when the blocking operation completes.

data.name: Abortable_FailedHeaderMsg
data.comment: Header text displayed when the blocking operation completes, but fails.

data.name: Abortable_StartedHeaderMsg
data.comment: Header text displayed when the blocking operation is started.

data.name: Abortable_ExceptionHeaderMsg
data.comment: Header text displayed when the blocking operation fails to complete.

data.name: Abortable_AlternateBtnText
data.comment: The text displayed on the button when the blocking operation completes or fails, and autoforwarding is disabled.

data.name: Abortable_AbortBtnText
data.comment: Text displayed on button that cancels the blocking operation.

data.name: Abortable_AbortSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the user aborts the blocking operation.

data.name: Abortable_CompletedSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: The text displayed below the header when the blocking operation completes.
Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking operation completes.

data.name: Abortable_FailedSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking operation completes, but fails.

data.name: Abortable_StartedSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header text, when the blocking operation is started.

data.name: Abortable_ExceptionSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking operation fails to complete.

data.name: Abortable_NoNetworkSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking network operation can't proceed due to a lack of network connectivity.

data.name: Abortable_NoServerSubHeaderMsg
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking network operation can't proceed due to an unresponsive server.

data.name: Abortable_PersistedRequestsSubHeaderMsg
data.value: Esperando la carga de datos. {0} mensajes restantes...
data.comment: Subheader text displayed below the header when the blocking network operation can't proceed until previously enqueued operations are executed.

data.name: SelectDialogue_PromptAdditionalWordWOMore
data.comment: Used at before the the last word of a list of additional commands available at a selection dialogue. Speaks the last command in the list. For example "or say,,, help, retrain, OR repeat"

data.name: SelectDialogue_PromptAdditionalWordWMore
data.comment: Spoken prompt for each additional command available at a selection dialogue.

data.name: Text_DataLossAlertTitle
data.comment: Title text for data loss alert.

data.name: Text_DataLossAlertBody
data.value: Se detectó pérdida de datos. Verifique la configuración de la red.
data.comment: Body text for data loss alert.

data.name: VoiceHelpWorkflowActivity_SubHeader

data.name: BluetoothScannerConnectionFailed

data.name: NoiseSampleInfoText

data.name: RetrievingData

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_CreatingReportHeader
data.comment: Header displayed during all steps of report generation.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_GatheringInfoSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed while gathering info for problem report.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_CompressingFilesSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed while zipping the problem report.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_CompressionCanceledSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed if Cancel button is pressed while zipping the problem report.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_CompressionFailedSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed if compression fails.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_UploadingReportHeader
data.comment: Header displayed while uploading problem report zip.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_UploadingReportSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed while uploading problem report zip.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_ReportUploadedSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed when problem report is finished uploading.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_ReportSavedSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed when problem report is saved locally (embedded mode).

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_ReportSavedDueToErrorSubHeader
data.value: Error al cargar informe de problema. Informe guardado localmente en {0}
data.comment: Subheader displayed when problem report fails to upload.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_SavingReportSubHeader
data.comment: Subheader displayed when user cancels report upload.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_ContinueButtonText
data.comment: Text displayed when operation is finished or canceled.

data.name: SubmitProblemReportWorkflowActivity_CancelButtonText
data.comment: Application button text displayed when operation can be canceled.

data.name: MenuItemDialogue_NoMoreNotAllowed
data.value: no hay artículos seleccionados, no se permite “No más” en este momento

data.name: MenuItemDialogue_SelectionTypeBoth_MainHelpNoKeyWord
data.value: diga el valor clave, o diga el artículo, o diga {0} para escuchar la lista,

data.name: MenuItemDialogue_SelectionTypeBoth_MainHelpWithKeyWord
data.value: diga {0}, seguido del valor clave, o diga el artículo, o diga {1} para escuchar la lista,

data.name: MenuItemDialogue_SelectionTypeIndexOnly_MainHelpNoKeyWord
data.value: diga el valor clave, o diga el artículo,

data.name: MenuItemDialogue_SelectionTypeIndexOnly_MainHelpWithKeyWord
data.value: diga {0}, seguido del valor clave, o diga el artículo,

data.name: PhotoCaptureDialogue_NoMoreNotAllowed
data.value: Debe tomar al menos una foto

data.name: PhotoCaptureDialogue_PhotoInProgress
data.value: Debe cerrar la cámara o la galería

data.name: PhotoCapture_PhotosNotSupportedMessage
data.value: :( No se otorgaron permisos para las fotos

data.name: PhotoCapture_PhotosPermissionDeniedMessage
data.value: No se puede acceder a las fotos

data.name: PhotoCapture_CameraExceptionMessage
data.value: No se puede abrir la cámara

data.name: PhotoCapture_PhotosExceptionMessage
data.value: No se puede abrir la galería de fotos

data.name: VoiceNotes_Voice
data.comment: Used as the header for the voice recording tab

data.name: VoiceNotes_Text
data.comment: Used as the header for the text entry tab

data.name: RecordMemo_Prompt
data.value: diga Listo para empezar a grabar

data.name: ReviewMemos_Prompt
data.value: diga “Listo” para reproducir memorando actual, “Siguiente” para reproducir el siguiente memorando o diga “No más” cuando haya terminado de revisar memorandos

data.name: RecordMemo_RecogDisabled_Header
data.value: No se pueden comenzar a grabar memorandos si el reconocimiento de voz está desactivado
data.comment: The header text shown on-screen when trying to record a memo with voice recognition disabled.

data.name: RecordMemo_RecogDisabled_Prompt
data.value: no se pueden comenzar a grabar memorandos si el reconocimiento de voz está desactivado
data.comment: The prompt to speak when trying to record a memo with voice recognition disabled.

data.name: ReviewNotes_Prompt
data.value: diga “Listo” para reproducir la nota actual, “Siguiente” para reproducir la siguiente nota o diga “No más” cuando haya terminado de revisar las notas

data.name: Transcription_Placeholder
data.comment: Placeholder for the transcription editor when there is no transcription present.

data.name: VocabWord_OrderStatus
data.comment: System Vocabulary Word to request status of an order.

data.name: SignOnText
data.comment: Text to display in the flyout menu's current user section when no user is signed on, indicating that touching will take the user to a screen to sign on.

data.name: SignOnInitials
data.comment: Text to display in a small user initials circle when no user is signed on.

data.name: SignOffText
data.comment: Text to display in the flyout menu's user action section when a user is signed on, indicating that touching will take the user to a screen to sign off.

data.name: UpdateTrainSelectWordWorkflowActivity_VocabSet
data.comment: Picker label

data.name: UpdateTrainSelectWordWorkflowActivity_SelectVocabSet
data.comment: Picker menu label

data.comment: Drop down option

data.name: UpdateTrainSelectWordWorkflowActivity_VocabSet_All
data.comment: Drop down option

data.name: UpdateTrainSelectWordWorkflowActivity_VocabSet_Untrained
data.comment: Drop down option

data.name: WorkflowListWorkflowActivity_Header
data.value: Diga un número o pulse un flujo de trabajo para seleccionar
data.comment: Application screen header

data.name: WorkflowListWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt after intial login.

data.name: VoiceAndAudioSettingsWorkflowActivity_ToastDialogs
data.value: Transcribe las indicaciones habladas por la aplicación en la pantalla
data.comment: Title for the setting which adds closed captioning style captions to each screen.

data.name: VoiceAndAudioSettingsWorkflowActivity_DisableToastDialogs
data.value: Los subtítulos de voz en pantalla están deshabilitados
data.comment: This tells the application NOT TO draw captions on screen.

data.name: VoiceAndAudioSettingsWorkflowActivity_EnableToastDialogs
data.value: Los subtítulos de voz en pantalla están habilitados.
data.comment: This tells the application to draw captions on screen.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_ChooseWorkflowFilter
data.value: Elegir filtro de flujo de trabajo
data.comment: "Choose Workflow Filter" label text.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_EmbeddedDemo
data.comment: "Embedded Demo" text for workflow filter picker.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_Server
data.comment: "Server" text for workflow filter picker.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_ServerSecureConnections
data.comment: Label text for HTTPS checkbox.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_ServerHost
data.comment: Label for server host field.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_ServerPort
data.comment: Label for server port field.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_SiteLabel
data.comment: Label for site settings section.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_SubmitButtonText
data.comment: Submit button text.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_SitePickerTitle
data.comment: Label for site picker.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_LoadingSites
data.comment: Message displayed while retrieving site list from server.

data.name: ServerSettingsWorkflowActivity_SitesUnavailable
data.value: Los sitios actualmente no están disponibles.
data.comment: Message displayed if site list is unavailable and cannot be retrieved.

data.name: NoiseSampleDisableVoiceRecognitionAlertTitleText
data.comment: A summary of a question to the user whether or not voice recognition should be disabled.

data.name: NoiseSampleDisableVoiceRecognitionAlertMessageText
data.value: Si continúa, la aplicación desactivará el reconocimiento de voz hasta que lo active en el menú Configuración de voz y audio.
data.comment: Details of a question to the user whether or not voice recognition should be disabled.

data.name: NoiseSampleDisableVoiceRecognitionAlertAcceptText
data.comment: "Continue" button text that disables voice recognition.

data.name: NoiseSampleDisableVoiceRecognitionAlertCancelText
data.comment: "Cancel" button text that returns to the noise sample feature.

data.name: SignOffFromFlyoutConfirmationWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header

data.name: SignOffFromFlyoutConfirmationWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Prompt spoken to confirm sign off.

data.name: PercentComplete
data.comment: The generic text used to label the current completion percentage of a process.

data.name: VoiceTrainingProgressFormat
data.comment: Label text shown on-screen during voice training, first number {1} displays the number of words already trained. Second number {2} displays the total that need trained.

data.name: TitleMessage_Enrollment
data.comment: Title text displayed during Voice Training / Enrollment Training.

data.name: TitleMessage_NoiseSample
data.comment: Title Text displayed during a background noise sample.

data.name: VoiceTraining_BackupTemplatesUsed_Warning
data.value: Advertencia:\nHubo un error al intentar recuperar las plantillas de voz.\nPuede ser por esto que se le indica que entrene.
data.comment: The warning to display to the user when backup templates are being used due to a connection problem with the server.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage1Header
data.comment: The header text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the first page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage1Body
data.value: Antes de comenzar, debe realizar un entrenamiento de voz, lo que toma aproximadamente {0} minutos.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen before voice training on the first page of instructions. Displayed when there is more than a minute of estimated training time.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage1Body_LessThanAMinute
data.value: Antes de comenzar, debe realizar un entrenamiento de voz, lo que debería tomarle menos de un minuto.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen before voice training on the first page of instructions. Displayed when there is less than one minute of estimated training time.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage1Body_AboutAMinute
data.value: Antes de comenzar, debe realizar un entrenamiento de voz, lo que toma aproximadamente un minuto.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen before voice training on the first page of instructions. Displayed when there is about one minute of estimated training time.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage2Header
data.comment: The header text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the second page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage2Body
data.value: Durante el entrenamiento, dirá una serie de palabras que se pueden repetir o tendrán un orden aleatorio.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the second page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage3Header
data.comment: The header text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the third page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage3Body
data.value: El entrenamiento de voz funciona mejor en el entorno donde trabaja.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the third page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage4Header
data.comment: The header text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the fourth page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsPage4Body
data.value: El sistema debe tomar una muestra de ruido de fondo para poder reconocer su voz en su entorno.
data.comment: The body text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the fourth page of instructions.

data.name: VoiceTrainingInstructionsFinalPageFooter
data.comment: The footer text shown on-screen prior to voice training during the final page of instructions.

data.name: NoiseSampleAdjustingBackgroundNoiseDescription
data.comment: One-line description about why the user needs to do the noise sample procedure, displayed during the procedure.

data.name: OperPrepWordsInstructions
data.comment: One-line instructions to user about speaking words for voice training. Encompasses both plural and singular, e.g., "Take a break" and "ready".

data.name: VoiceTrainingComplete
data.comment: Text shown on screen when voice-template training is complete. Shown at same time that device is speaking the value for key "finished_creating_voice_templates".

data.name: ReportProblem
data.comment: "Report Problem" overflow menu item.

data.name: ReportProblemWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Header on "Report Problem" page.

data.name: ReportProblemWorkflowActivity_NoteLabel
data.comment: Label text explaining what to fill in on Report Problem page.

data.name: ReportProblemWorkflowActivity_ButtonText
data.comment: Text for "submit" button on Report Problem page.

data.name: DialogueRunnerUnknownError
data.value: Error en el diálogo de voz, informe el problema. Use la pantalla para completar la tarea actual y continúe
data.comment: Spoken to user when current voice input dialogue encounters unexpected error and shuts down.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_RestartRequiredMessage
data.value: Se debe reiniciar la aplicación para que los cambios de idioma entren en vigencia

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_DeviceDefault
data.comment: Displays the devices default locale such as English or German

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoNotAvailableMessage
data.value: Recolectar e ir no disponible para {0}, se desactivará.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_NewPickUpAndGoVersionAvailableTitle
data.value: Nueva versión de Pick Up and Go disponible

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_NewPickUpAndGoVersionAvailableMessage
data.value: Hay una nueva versión de Pick Up and Go disponible para descargar para {0}. ¿Desea descargarla?

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_InvalidLanguage_Message
data.value: Estos nombres de idiomas no son válidos: {0}

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoAvailableToDownload_Title
data.value: Pick Up and Go disponible para descargar

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoAvailableToDownload_Message
data.value: No se ha descargado el modelo de Pick Up and Go para {0}. ¿Desea descargarlo ahora?

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoDownloading_Text
data.value: Descargando Pick Up and Go para {0}

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoDownloaded_Text
data.value: Se descargó Pick Up and Go para {0} (versión: {1})

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoNotDownloaded_Title
data.value: No se descargó Pick Up and Go para {0}

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoNotDownloaded_Text
data.value: {1}. Se desactivará Pick Up and Go.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_PickUpAndGoNotDownloadedFallBack_Text
data.value: {1}. Usando la versión existente en el dispositivo.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_NoNetworkConnection_Title
data.value: No hay conexión a la red

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_NoNetworkConnection_Message
data.value: No hay conexión a la red, no se puede descargar el modelo Pick Up and Go para {0}. Se desactivará Pick Up and Go.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_NoNetworkConnectionFallBack_Message
data.value: No hay conexión a la red, no se puede descargar el modelo Pick Up and Go para {0}. Usando la versión existente en el dispositivo.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_UpdatingAvailablePickUpAndGoModels_Message
data.value: Actualizando los modelos Pick Up and Go disponibles.

data.name: LanguagesMenuWorkflowActivity_DeviceOffline_ToastMessage
data.value: El dispositivo está desconectado. No podrá descargar ningún modelo de idioma nuevo.

data.name: Android_Foreground_Notification_Title
data.comment: A short title for the notification that is used to keep the application in the foreground. Must fit on one line of a notification for small devices, using a large font.

data.name: Android_Foreground_Notification_Summary
data.comment: A short summary for the notification that is used to keep the application in the foreground, where the parameter is the name of the application. Must fit on one line of a notification for small devices.

data.name: Android_Foreground_Notification_Text
data.value: Mantener la aplicación {0} en primer plano, de modo que pueda usarla con la pantalla apagada o mientras hay otra aplicación en primer plano.
data.comment: Text that explains why the application is kept in the foreground, where the parameter is the name of the application. Can use a larger amount of space.

data.name: Android_Foreground_Notification_Channel_Name
data.comment: A category name for notifications, per https://developer.android.com/training/notify-user/channels . Should be less than or equal to 40 characters

data.name: Android_Foreground_Notification_Channel_Description
data.value: Permite la operación cuando la aplicación está en segundo plano o si la pantalla está apagada.
data.comment: Tne description of the foreground notification channel/category, per https://developer.android.com/training/notify-user/channels . Should be less than or equal to 300 characters.

data.name: noise_sample_please_keep_quiet_instruction
data.value: Manténgase en silencio por algunos segundos
data.comment: Spoken prompt intructing the user to keep quiet for a noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_no_speech_detected_warning
data.value: No lo escuché, por favor hable más alto
data.comment: Spoken prompt used if no speech is detected during noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_first_utterance_prompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt instructing the user to speak during noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_first_utterance
data.comment: First utterance to be spoken during noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_second_utterance
data.comment: Second utterance to be spoken during noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_third_utterance
data.comment: Third utterance to be spoken during noise sample.

data.name: noise_sample_warning_too_long
data.value: La muestra de ruido fue demasiado larga
data.comment: Spoken prompt used if speech detected during noise sample was too long.

data.name: noise_sample_completed
data.value: Se terminó la muestra de ruido
data.comment: Spoken prompt used when a noise sample completes successfully.

data.name: noise_sample_paused
data.comment: Spoken prompt used when a noise sample is paused.

data.name: noise_sample_failed
data.comment: Spoken prompt used when a noise sample has failed.

data.name: training_please_say_following_words
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text when instructing the user to speak words for training.

data.name: training_wait_for_template_creation
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text while waiting for voice templates to be created.

data.name: finished_creating_voice_templates
data.value: Se terminaron de crear las plantillas de voz.
data.comment: Spoken prompt used when voice templates have been created.

data.name: training_interrupted
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text when training is interrupted.

data.name: training_timed_out
data.value: Se excedió el tiempo de espera del entrenamiento
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text when training times out while waiting for the user to speak.

data.name: training_failed
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text when training fails.

data.name: training_stopped
data.comment: Prompt spoken/onscreen text when training is stopped.

data.name: training_pause_display_between_words
data.comment: Text displayed on screen during the pause between words in training.

data.name: pick_from_list_help_only_1_option
data.comment: The help prompt spoken when the user is presented a list with only one option.

data.name: pick_from_list_help_multiple_options
data.comment: The help prompt spoken when the user is presented with a list of two options.

data.name: pick_from_list_confirmation_prompt
data.comment: Prompt user for confirmation of a list selection.

data.name: digit_entry_say_digits
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak a certain number of digits.

data.name: digit_entry_say_between_digits
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak within a certain range of digits.

data.name: value_entry_say_characters
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak a certain number of characters.

data.name: value_entry_say_between_characters
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak within a certain range of characters.

data.name: digit_entry_long_value_help
data.value: diga dígitos, pause para escuchar el último grupo hablado, diga No para rechazar el último grupo hablado, diga Listo para completar la entrada.
data.comment: Main help prompt for long value entry dialogue

data.name: value_entry_long_value_help_characters
data.value: diga caracteres, pause para escuchar el último grupo hablado, diga No para rechazar el último grupo hablado, diga Listo para completar la entrada.
data.comment: Main help prompt for long value entry dialogue

data.name: default_help_no_help_available
data.comment: Spoken prompt used when no help prompt exists for this WFA.

data.name: default_help_only_1_word
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak a word.

data.name: default_help_multiple_words
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking the user to speak one of two words.

data.name: default_help_multiple_words_and_anchors
data.comment: Spoken after default_help_multiple_words, when the user must say an anchor word after their input

data.name: yes
data.comment: "Yes"

data.name: no
data.comment: "No" command word

data.name: accept_entry_word
data.comment: "Ready" command word.

data.name: next_entry_word
data.comment: "Next" command word

data.name: digits_word
data.comment: "Digits" command word

data.name: Validation_GetValue_MinAndMax
data.value: Ingresó {0}, el valor debe ser entre {1} y {2}, vuelva a intentarlo
data.comment: Text displayed or spoken when get digits is not in specified range

data.name: Validation_GetValue_Min
data.value: Ingresó {0}, el valor debe ser mayor que o igual a {1}, vuelva a intentarlo
data.comment: Text displayed or spoken when get digits entry is less than min value

data.name: Validation_GetValue_Max
data.value: Ingresó {0}, el valor debe ser menor que o igual a {1}, vuelva a intentarlo
data.comment: Text displayed or spoken when get digits entry is greater than max value

data.name: Validation_GetValue_NotNumeric
data.value: {0} no es un valor numérico, vuelva a intentarlo
data.comment: Text displayed or spoken when get digits entry is expected to be numeric

data.name: Validation_GetValue_MinLength
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese al menos {1} caracteres totales
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry doesn't have enough digits

data.name: Validation_GetValue_MaxLength
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese un máximo de {1} caracteres totales
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry doesn't have enough digits

data.name: Validation_GetDigits_InsufficientWholeNumbers
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese al menos {1} dígitos antes del decimal
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry doesn't have enough digits before the decimal place

data.name: Validation_GetDigits_ExcessiveWholeNumbers
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese un máximo de {1} dígitos antes del decimal
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry has too many digits before the decimal place

data.name: Validation_GetDigits_InsufficientPrecision
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese al menos {1} dígitos después del decimal
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry doesn't have enough digits after the decimal place

data.name: Validation_GetDigits_ExcessivePrecision
data.value: {0} incorrecto, ingrese un máximo de {1} dígitos después del decimal
data.comment: Test displayed when the the digit entry has too many digits after the decimal place

data.name: Validation_GetValue_InvalidCharacters
data.comment: Text displayed when the the value entry has invalid characters

data.name: Validation_General_UnexpectedValue
data.comment: Text displayed or spoken when entry is not one of expected values

data.name: DateDialogue_Invalid_Prompt
data.value: Fecha no válida para mes {0}, día {1} y año {2}

data.name: DateDialogue_BiggerThanMax_Prompt
data.value: Mes {0}, día {1} y año {2} no válidos, ingrese una fecha en o antes del mes {3}, día {4} y año {5}.

data.name: DateDialogue_SmallerThanMin_Prompt
data.value: Mes {0}, día {1} y año {2} no válidos, ingrese una fecha en o después del mes {3}, día {4} y año {5}.
